DOC.brief_summary: This trial evaluate efficacy Everolimus combination centre specific standard immunosuppressive regimen versus standard immunosuppressive regimen concern kidney function lung transplant recipient .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Everolimus Combination With Specific Standard Immunosuppressive Regimen Lung Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Adult recipient de novo cadaveric lung transplant Exclusion criterion : Patients thrombocytopenia ( platelet < 100,000/mm³ ) , absolute neutrophil count < 1,500/mm³ leucopenia ( leucocytes < 3000/mm³ ) , anemia Hb < 8g/dl time screen Patients uncontrolled hypercholesterolemia ( > 330mg/dL ; > 9mmol/L ) hypertriglyceridemia ( > 300 mg/dL ; > 8.5 mmol/L ) time screen Patients history malignancy organ system , treat untreated , last five year , whether evidence local recurrence metastasis , except squamous basal cell carcinoma skin Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
